metadata.title: CVE-2020-36311 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.9.arch/x86/kvm/svm/sev.c allows attackers to cause a denial of service (softlockup) by triggering destruction of a large SEV VM (which requiresunregistering many encrypted regions), aka CID-7be74942f184.
